overview: Before and after class — all these young guys can think about is bareback ass. These boys need to hit those books and cram for the big exam — but instead, they hit each other's ass and cram their cocks down each other's throats. College can be fun, but it's also a place to learn and these young studs show us just what they've learned in the dorm rooms and frat houses of our finest institutions.
title: College Studs And Bareback Buds
